data.title: Valdosta State University
data.meta_description: Valdosta State University Data, Ratings and Rankings
data.text:
Valdosta State University is a public, state university in the town of Valdosta, Georgia. Valdosta State was founded in 1906. The college enrolls around 10,225 students per year, including 7,589 undergrad students.

Valdosta State Acceptance Rate

It is moderately difficult to get into Valdosta State. In 2022, Valdosta State accepted 91% of applicants. In 2022, 4,468 out of 4,934 total applicants were accepted.

Valdosta State University Admissions Facts At-A-Glance Overall Acceptance Rate 91% Early Decision Acceptance Rate ED not offered Early Action Acceptance Rate EA not offered Average GPA 3.4 Test Optional Yes Applicants Submitting SAT scores 56.2%

Valdosta State Campus Tours

Valdosta State University is located in Valdosta, Georgia,.

If you would like to see Valdosta State for yourself, plan a visit. The best way to reach campus is to take Interstate 75 to Valdosta, or book a flight to the nearest airport, Valdosta Regional.
